department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: To learn how to conduct a scientific research

content.en:
The topic is to investigate the formation process of the penumbra of a sunspot.
It will consists of
1. learning about the sunspot penumbra
2. learning about different analysis techniques
3. analyzing real solar images using these techniques
